list.name: Log annotations
list.query: SELECT "log_entry" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("box" =~ /^$boxtag$/ AND "log_type" = 'Internet connection') AND $timeFilter ORDER BY time DESC

targets.query: SELECT "log_entry" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("box" =~ /^$boxtag$/ AND "log_type" = 'Internet connection') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "log_type"

panels.description: Is there a Fritz!OS update available

targets.query: SELECT last("upgrade_available") FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("box" =~ /^$boxtag$/)

panels.title: Update

targets.query: SELECT "linkuptime" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("box" =~ /^$boxtag$/)
SELECT last("receiverate")*8 AS "current", last("downstreammax") AS "max" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("box" =~ /^$boxtag$/)
SELECT last("sendrate")*8 AS "current", last("upstreammax") AS "max" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("box" =~ /^$boxtag$/)
SELECT last("ram_usage_fixed") + last("ram_usage_dynamic") FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("box" =~ /^$boxtag$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("totalbytessent"))) FROM /^$measurement$/  WHERE ("box" =~ /^$boxtag$/) AND $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval) tz(${timezone:singlequote})
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("totalbytesreceived"))) FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("box" =~ /^$boxtag$/) AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) tz(${timezone:singlequote})
SELECT last("active_host"::field), "port"::tag, "ipv4_last_used"::tag::integer  FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("box" =~ /^$boxtag$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "name", "mac", "port"
SELECT last("systemuptime") FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("box" =~ /^$boxtag$/)
SELECT "totalbytessent" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE $timeFilter

SELECT last("DEV") FROM(
SELECT derivative(last("totalbytesreceived"), $interval) as "DEV" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("box" =~ /^$boxtag$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "box") WHERE "DEV" < 0
SELECT "active_host" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("box" =~ /^$boxtag$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"
SELECT "active_host" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("box" =~ /^$boxtag$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "name"

list.description: Measurement name for the fritzflux data
list.label: InfluxDB measurement
list.name: measurement

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM $measurement WITH KEY=box
list.label: FritzBox
list.name: boxtag
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM $measurement WITH KEY=box

list.definition: SELECT last("DEV") FROM(SELECT derivative(last("totalbytesreceived"), 30s) as "DEV" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("box" =~ /^$boxtag$/) AND time >= now() - 24h GROUP BY time(30s)) WHERE "DEV" < 0
list.name: test
list.query: SELECT last("DEV") FROM(SELECT derivative(last("totalbytesreceived"), 30s) as "DEV" FROM /^$measurement$/ WHERE ("box" =~ /^$boxtag$/) AND time >= now() - 24h GROUP BY time(30s)) WHERE "DEV" < 0
